short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create tutorials, product demos, guides, and walkthroughs that are always up-to-date

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ottoclip allows you to create narrated tutorial videos that are always up-to-date.

1. Use our browser extension to record the steps of your tutorial by simply performing the actions in your browser.
2. We automatically generate narrations for your actions and make it easy for you to customize them.
3. We generate narrated tutorial videos, walkthrough articles with screenshots, and slideshows from your script and host them for you to make it easy for you to share them with others.

Benefits
* Easy to change - Did your app or site change? Need to add an explanation? Simply update your script and we'll regenerate your tutorial for you.
* Ready to share - We host your tutorials for you so you don't need to do any additional work to share them with others.
* Always up-to-date - We regenerate your tutorials regularly to ensure they are always up-to-date and alert you of any breaking changes.
